author: Simon Difford
description: An enduring classic given a touch of apple. Those with a sweet tooth may want to add more apple liqueur or even a dash of sugar syrup.
name: Apple Mojito
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) mint in base of glass
Add other ingredients, half fill glass with crushed ice and CHURN (stir) with bar spoon
Fill glass to brim with more crushed ice and CHURN some more
